name: Evolve - The Fly Simulator
description:
The life of a fly is hard, help a little eat some goodies, poop it out again and EVOLVE!

This is our first Ludum Dare (34) entry ever made. Soo, don't be to hard on us.. :D

Here is the source code!

We currently redesigning the whole game and will develop a complete new version with loads of cool stuff in the Unreal Engine 4.

Have fun with the current buggy Ludum Dare version! Leave us a comment if you like :)
